text: Operational guidance requires explicit content for extraction.
Generalize examples to normalized principles during extraction.
IF  THEN Never extract verbatim; paraphrase and abstract operational content.
IF  THEN Domains must be inferred from the closest applicable category if text is empty.
IF  THEN Operational content must be explicit to avoid under-extraction.
CLAIM: Text emptiness directly impacts extraction effectiveness.
CLAIM: Operational content extraction prioritizes actionable guidance over literary elements.
